text: Miguel Arroyo Rosales (6 December 1966 - 30 January 2020) was a Mexican road racing cyclist. He was a professional from 1989 to 1997. He was born in Huamantla, Mexico. Arroyo died at a hospital in Puebla, Mexico on 30 January 2020 from surgery-related problems, aged 53.Murió Miguel Arroyo, uno de los máximos exponentes del ciclismo en México ==References== Category:1966 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from surgical complications Category:Mexican cyclists Category:People from Tlaxcala
title: Miguel Arroyo
